attributes.action: Don’t ban tobacco products for 2009s and 2010s
attributes.additional_details: Unlift the ban of tobacco for these ages to stop people from getting spiked and getting supplied low quality and more harmful tobacco that would cause more hospitalisation and stress on the nhs
attributes.background: There is lotsofpeople in these years that are addictedtotobacco and if these people are banned from buying tobacco when there older it will cause an illegalsupplyoftobacco thatcouldbe extremelyharmful and lowquality or could bespiked and asmuch asthere’s pressure onthenhs, freedomofchoice is needed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647395
